campaign_slogan: H2O Bar: Sip Fresh, Eat Healthy, Feel Great! ✨
notification: ⏳ Fresh deals at H2O Bar! Use points for 10€ off bowls & juices or grab a free protein boost. Healthy & tasty awaits! Tap now!
campaign_message: Fuel your day the healthy way at H2O Bar! 🥗 Discover our vibrant Toasts, energizing Bowls, fresh Cold-Pressed Juices & more. Use your points for amazing discounts like €5 off bowls/toasts or a FREE juice! Taste the freshness! 🥑🍓
promotions: Use 30 points for a free Cold-Pressed Juice (like Power or Detox)!
Use 500 points for €5 off any delicious Toast or Bowl!
Use 250 points for a free Protein Ball add-on!

campaign_slogan: Savored Journeys: Your points unlock Paris adventures! ✈️
notification: 🗼Dreaming of Paris? Use points for HUGE savings on your trip with Savored Journeys! ⏳ Spend 2000 points for €20 off tours. Tap for deals!
campaign_message: Bonjour! ✨ Plan your dream Paris getaway with Savored Journeys! 🥐 Explore iconic sights like the Eiffel Tower & Louvre, indulge in delicious food, and cruise the Seine. Use your points for amazing discounts on tours and experiences recommended by Savored Journeys. Start planning your adventure today! 🇫🇷
promotions: Use 2000 points for a €20 discount on booking a Paris walking tour through Savored Journeys.
Use 1500 points for 10% off a recommended Paris hotel booking via Savored Journeys.
Use 1000 points for a free Paris Metro guide download from Savored Journeys.
Use 3000 points for a €30 voucher towards a Champagne side trip booked via Savored Journeys.

campaign_slogan: Savored Journeys: Your points unlock Paris! 🇫🇷✨
notification: ⏳ Dream trip to Paris? Use points for amazing tours & experiences with Savored Journeys! ✨ Save €€ on cruises & food tours. Tap for deals!
campaign_message: Bonjour, traveler! 🗼🥐 Explore the magic of Paris with Savored Journeys. Use your points for incredible savings on guided food tours, romantic Seine River cruises, and authentic cooking classes. ✨ Let Savored Journeys guide your perfect Parisian adventure! Redeem points now! 🇫🇷
promotions: Use 1000 points for €20 off a guided food tour in Paris with Savored Journeys.
Use 750 points for 10% off a Seine River Cruise booking via Savored Journeys.
Use 1500 points for a €30 voucher towards a French cooking class experience recommended by Savored Journeys.
Use 250 points for a downloadable Paris neighborhood guide from Savored Journeys.
